sentences.en: At Winchell Donut Shops in California, Gore donuts areoutselling Bushes.
sentences.cn: 在加州的温歇尔甜甜圈店, 戈尔甜甜圈卖得比布什甜甜圈好.

sentences.en: Danny, are you wearing a donut?
sentences.cn: 丹尼, 你不是戴着游泳圈 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you know the donut man who lives across the lane?
sentences.cn: 你知道那个在小胡同的交叉口烤面包圈的人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you know the donut man, the donut man, the donut man?
sentences.cn: 你知道那个烤面包圈的人, 烤面包圈的人, 烤面包圈的人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Every donut will carry you one kilometre.
sentences.cn: 每个油炸圈饼会运送你一公里.

sentences.en: Go to the restaurant, eat a donut.
sentences.cn: 去饭馆, 去吃面包圈.

sentences.en: I need a jumbo sized donut and an iced tea.
sentences.cn: 我想要一份特大号甜甜圈和冰茶.

sentences.en: I want to eat a donut.
So I wrote a funny poem about a donut.
sentences.cn: 因此,我写了一首关于donut的诗歌.

sentences.en: So, a purpose is like a box of powdered donut holes?
sentences.cn: 那么目的就像一盒沾满面粉的油炸圈饼?

sentences.en: Tong then goes to Siam Square for a date with Donut.
sentences.cn: 塘,然后去暹罗广场,为一日期与甜甜圈.

sentences.en: Yes I know the donut man who lives across the lane.
sentences.cn: 是的,我知道那个在小胡同的交叉口烤面包圈的人.

sentences.en: Yes I know the donut man, the donut man, the donut man.
sentences.cn: 是的,我知道那个烤面包圈的人, 烤面包圈的人, 烤面包圈的人.

sentences.en: You would want to smack anyone who offers you the next donut.
sentences.cn: 或许你还会很想揍这时候还给你甜甜圈的人哩.
